casebody.data:
STATE
v.
Melvin Leroy FOWLER 173PA17-1 Supreme Court of North Carolina. November 28, 2017 Jason C. Yoder, Attorney at Law, for Fowler, Melvin Leroy. Christopher W. Brooks, Assistant Attorney General, N. Lorrin Freeman, District Attorney, for State of North Carolina.

The following order has been entered on the Motion for Extension of Time to File Brief filed on the 28th of November 2017 by State of NC:

"Motion Allowed by order of the Court in conference, this the 28th of November 2017."

State of NC shall have up to and including the 3rd day of January 2018 to file and serve his/her brief with this Court.
